price: Dia-lah Allah Yang tiada Tuhan (yang berhak disembah) selain Dia, Yang Mengetahui yang gaib dan yang nyata, Dia-lah Yang Maha Pemurah lagi Maha Penyayang.
arabic: هُوَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِي لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۖ عَٰلِمُ ٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَٱلشَّهَٰدَةِۖ هُوَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: huwa al-lahu alladhī lā ilāha illā huwa ʿālimu al-ghaybi wal-shahādati huwa al-raḥmānu al-raḥīmu
